description:
renaming_1: hand-edited files for go 1 renaming
This contains the files that required handiwork, mostly
Makefiles with updated TARGs, plus the two packages
with modified package names.
html/template/doc.go needs a separate edit pass.
test/fixedbugs/bug358.go is not legal go so gofix fails on it.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

http://rsc.codereview.appspot.com/5340050/diff/1/doc/effective_go.html
File doc/effective_go.html (right):

http://rsc.codereview.appspot.com/5340050/diff/1/doc/effective_go.html#newcode2933
doc/effective_go.html:2933: var // Q=17, R=18
Lost most of this statement to the next line.

http://rsc.codereview.appspot.com/5340050/diff/1/src/pkg/html/template/doc.go
File src/pkg/html/template/doc.go (right):

http://rsc.codereview.appspot.com/5340050/diff/1/src/pkg/html/template/doc.go#newcode6
src/pkg/html/template/doc.go:6: Package html is a specialization of package template that automates the
Package html/template?

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f759d7ef4e8b ***

renaming_1: hand-edited files for go 1 renaming
This contains the files that required handiwork, mostly
Makefiles with updated TARGs, plus the two packages
with modified package names.
html/template/doc.go needs a separate edit pass.
test/fixedbugs/bug358.go is not legal go so gofix fails on it.
